title: Why is there no Normal Draft in th OCE?
body: I might have missed a point here, but does anyone know why there is no Normal Draft mode under PvP in OCE. It's just It's like I hate playing Darius and finding in the loading screen that I'm facing Teemo.

replies.body:
Riot say the OCE population is too small to sustain multiple normal modes and keep que times "healthy"

They said they would look into it again when "Solo Ranked" came around, lo and behold, Solo Ranked got canned and so did the idea of looking into OCE draft normals.

> [{quoted}](name=BarryButcher,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=5a09cxxb,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-20T12:45:02.512+0000)
>
> Riot say the OCE population is too small to sustain multiple normal modes and keep que times "healthy"
> 
> They said they would look into it again when "Solo Ranked" came around, lo and behold, Solo Ranked got canned and so did the idea of looking into OCE draft normals.

Easy, axe the blind pick. It drives me crazy and it's the main reason I mainly play aram.

if you axe blind pick, then there will be certain champions (like Zed etc) who people will literally never get to play, even in normals since they would be permabans in ranked and norms.

A very simple and easy fix is to simply let us have it like ranked 5's and the like. 2-3 days a week for a few hours. If it is shown to be very popular, make it permanent. But Riot don't even bother giving us a taste
Tbh i want my money back because i changed my main account from na to oce and it didnt tell me that i cant play the modes i played everyday, i payed 20$ for nothing (on my main account)
Except by riot, because it's gone and forgotten by them.
